post.description:
Create a new user account with email, password, and user type.
Returns the created user object.

Authenticate user with email and password.
Returns JWT access and refresh tokens.

Use refresh token to obtain a new access token.
Requires valid refresh token in Authorization header.

get.summary: Get user profile
get.description:
Retrieve the profile of the currently authenticated user.
Requires valid access token in Authorization header.

get.summary: Get all instruments in the catalog

post.summary: Create a new instrument in the catalog (any authenticated user)

get.summary: Get instrument details from catalog
Get all available instruments for rent (with ownership details)
Get current user's rentals
Get rental details
Get personalized recommendations
get.description:
Get instrument recommendations based on rental history and ratings.
Recommends similar instruments to what you've rented, most popular instruments,
and highest-rated instruments.

get.summary: Get all available instruments for rent (public)

post.summary: Create a new instrument ownership (owners only)

get.summary: Get current user's owned instruments (owners only)
Get specific instrument ownership details
Get general dashboard statistics for the current user
Get renter's rental history and statistics
Get owner's instrument ownership and rental statistics
Get current user's survey response

post.summary: Create survey response after user registration

get.summary: Get survey response by ID
Get current user's payments (as renter or owner)

post.summary: Initiate a payment for a rental - returns Stripe client secret
Confirm payment after client-side Stripe processing

get.summary: Get payment details for a rental

post.summary: Refund a completed payment (renters can request, owners can issue)

get.summary: Get all reviews with optional filtering
get.description:
Query Parameters:
- instru_ownership_id: Filter by specific owned instrument copy
- rating: Filter by rating (1-5)

post.summary: Create a review for a completed rental
post.description:
Renters can only review their own completed rentals.
Each rental can only have one review.
The review is attached to the specific instrument copy (Instru_ownership).

get.summary: Get a specific review
Get ownership details with all reviews and statistics
get.description:
Returns:
- ownership: Instrument, owner, condition, rate
- reviews: All reviews from renters who rented this specific copy
- stats: Average rating, total count, distribution by rating

get.summary: Get all owned instruments with their reviews and stats
get.description: Shows all instrument copies owned by the owner, each with its own review list.

post.summary: Send a message to the chatbot and get a response

get.summary: Get all messages in a conversation session
Get all session IDs for the current user

post.summary: Ask the chatbot about instruments and get recommendations

delete.summary: Delete all messages in a conversation session

Bearer.description: JWT authentication token. Obtain from /api/auth/login. Click 'Authorize' and enter: Bearer <your-token>
